2012 wasare pawathi jana sangananayata anuwa rate janathawagen 12.5k enam 1/8k awurudu 60 wadi wadihitiyan lesa handunaganna ladi.eya apa rata laba athi itha honda jayagrahanayaki.ee manda ada wana wita apa rate aayu apekshawa awurudu 79k bawata pathwa thibimayi.mita wasara gananawakata ihathadi eya pawathiye awurudu 46k lesatayi.kese wuwath ratak lesa api idiriyata yamedi wadihitiyan sandaha nawa thakshanaya handunwa demin owun rate sanwardhanayata dayaka kara gatha yuthumaya.maha nagara ha basnahira sanwardhana garu amathya champika ranawaka mathithuma ee pilibandawa mese wigraha karanu labayi.
